title: Philips Signal Strength LED TV Antenna, Visually Displays Signal Strength, Supports 4K 1080P VHF UHF, Long Range, Signal Booster Amplifier, Smart TV Compatible, 10 ft. Coax Included, SDV3238N/27
features: Free HD channels – Watch favorite shows in full 1080p high definition without expensive cable or satellite service; enhanced reception makes this 4K/8K Ultra HD-ready TV antenna the ideal counterpart to streaming your favorite digital content

Long-range antenna – Works with all brands of TVs and converter boxes; integrated TruAmp Technology with built-in 4G/5G LTE filter blocks interference; boosts signal; provides clear, pure reception of HDTV channels up to 60 miles from broadcast source
Patented Signal Finder – Indoor TV antenna’s built-in LED signal meter helps identify best location and placement of your HDTV antenna to provide optimal reception of local channels in your area

NEXTGEN TV (ATSC 3.0) compatible – Experience this new broadcast standard for over-the-air TV when it’s available in your area; enjoy a stronger broadcast signal, premium audio, richer color, faster refresh rates, optional internet integration and more
U.S.-based tech support – Backed by a limited-lifetime replacement pledge and free U.S.-based technical support available Monday-Friday, 7AM-8PM Central Time to assist with any questions or issues
description: Hone in on the best viewing experience with the Philips Elite HD Signal Finder Amplified Antenna. The built-in, patented LED Signal Finder indicates the best location and orientation for optimal reception. Simply connect the antenna to your TV with its easy-twist coax cable and slowly reposition the antenna until you see the most LEDs illuminated. The LEDs turn off with a button press to eliminate unwanted light while offering the option to turn on the LEDs at any time to check signal strength again. The antenna’s TruAmp Technology with built-in 4G/5G LTE filter blocks unwanted cell phone interference and amplifies VHF and UHF broadcast signals for clear, pure reception of HDTV channels up to 60 miles of the broadcast source. This HD TV antenna is the perfect way to maximize your viewing experience while eliminating pricey cable and satellite services. If you’re not ready to cut the cord, the antenna complements subscriptions with free local broadcasts to stay informed during severe weather. Wall-mounting hardware and a convenient tabletop stand are included for versatile setup. The brushed black finish and sleek design coordinate seamlessly into your home theater. Focus on outstanding reception with the Philips Elite HD Signal Finder Amplified Antenna.
